Source.SQL Query:
select a.nombre
from hk22_area a
join hk22_tutor t
on a.id =t.id_area
WHERE upper(t.correo) = :APP_USER;

Pagination.Type: Row Ranges X to Y (with next and previous links)

Source.SQL Query:
select m.id, m.NOMBRE as asunto, u.nombre as de, u.id as id_res
from HK22_MENSAJE m
join hk22_usuario u
on ID_EMISOR= u.id
join hk22_usuario u2
on ID_RECEPTOR= u2.id
where upper(u2.EMAIL) = :APP_USER

Pagination.Type: Row Ranges X to Y (with next and previous links)

Source.SQL Query:
select m.id, m.NOMBRE as asunto, u.nombre as de, u.id as id_res
from HK22_MENSAJE m
join hk22_usuario u
on ID_EMISOR= u.id
join hk22_usuario u2
on ID_RECEPTOR= u2.id
where upper(u2.EMAIL) = :APP_USER
and m.VISTO='No'

Pagination.Type: Row Ranges X to Y (with next and previous links)

Source.SQL Query:

from HK22_MENSAJE m
join hk22_usuario u
on ID_EMISOR= u.id
join hk22_usuario u2
on ID_RECEPTOR= u2.id
where upper(u2.EMAIL) = :APP_USER
and m.VISTO='Si'

Source.SQL Query:
select m.id, m.NOMBRE as asunto, u.nombre as para, u.id as id_res
from HK22_MENSAJE m
join hk22_usuario u
on ID_RECEPTOR= u.id
join hk22_usuario u2
on ID_EMISOR= u2.id
where upper(u2.EMAIL) = :APP_USER

Source.SQL Query:
select u.id, count(k.id)
from hk22_usuario u 
left join hk22_kudos k
on k.ID_TUTOR= u.id
WHERE upper(u.EMAIL) = :APP_USER
group by u.id;

Link.Type: Redirect to Page in this Application

Source.SQL Query:
SELECT C2.ID, C2.NOMBRE,C2.DESCRIPCION
FROM HK22_MAESTRO M
JOIN HK22_CURSO C
ON M.ID_CURSO= C.ID
JOIN HK22_Clase C2
ON c2.ID_CURSO= C.ID
JOIN HK22_USUARIO U
ON M.ID_USUARIO= U.ID
WHERE UPPER(U.EMAIL)=:APP_USER

Pagination.Type: Row Ranges X to Y of Z (with pagination)

Source.SQL Query:
SElECT m.id,
        m.nombre,
        m.descripcion,
        m.id_modelo,
        mm.foto,
        mm.nivel
FROM HK22_MASCOTA m
join HK22_MODELO_MASCOTA mm
on mm.id=id_modelo
WHERE upper(m.EMAIL) = :APP_USER;

Link.Type: Redirect to Page in this Application

Source.SQL Query:
select e.ID,
       e.NOMBRE,
       e.DESCRIPCION,
       e.FOTO
  from HK22_EQUIPO e
  join HK22_USUARIO u
  on e.id= u.EQUIPO
  WHERE upper(u.EMAIL) = :APP_USER;

Source.SQL Query:
SElECT c.NOMBRE,
        c.DESCRIPCION,
        a.NOMBRE as area,
        i.NOMBRE as institucion,
        e.COMPLETADO
FROM HK22_ESTUDIANTE e
join HK22_CURSO c
on e.ID_CURSO=c.id
join HK22_AREA a
on c.ID_AREA=a.id
left join HK22_INSTITUCION i
on c.ID_INSTITUCION=i.id
where upper(e.EMAIL) = :APP_USER

Pagination.Type: Row Ranges X to Y of Z (with pagination)

Source.SQL Query:
SElECT c.NOMBRE,
        c.DESCRIPCION,
        a.NOMBRE as area,
        i.NOMBRE as institucion,
        e.COMPLETADO
FROM HK22_ESTUDIANTE e
join HK22_CURSO c
on e.ID_CURSO=c.id
join HK22_AREA a
on c.ID_AREA=a.id
left join HK22_INSTITUCION i
on c.ID_INSTITUCION=i.id
where upper(e.EMAIL) = :APP_USER 
    and e.COMPLETADO ='No'

Pagination.Type: Row Ranges X to Y of Z (with pagination)

Source.SQL Query:
SElECT c.NOMBRE,
        c.DESCRIPCION,
        a.NOMBRE as area,
        i.NOMBRE as institucion,
        e.COMPLETADO
FROM HK22_ESTUDIANTE e
join HK22_CURSO c
on e.ID_CURSO=c.id
join HK22_AREA a
on c.ID_AREA=a.id
left join HK22_INSTITUCION i
on c.ID_INSTITUCION=i.id
where upper(e.EMAIL) = :APP_USER 
    and e.COMPLETADO ='Si'

Server-side Condition.SQL Query:
select * from hk22_usuario
where upper(email)=:APP_USER
and foto is null

Source.SQL Query:
select ID,
       NOMBRE,
       EMAIL,
       PASSWORD,
       FOTO,
       PUNTOS,
       TIPO,
       ID_INSTITUCION,
       PREGUNTA,
       RESPUESTA,
       EQUIPO,
       DESCRIPCION
  from HK22_USUARIO
  WHERE upper(EMAIL) = :APP_USER;

and foto is null

Source.SQL Query:
SELECT A.FECHA, A.NOMBRE, A.DESCRIPCION, A.ID_AREA, U2.NOMBRE AS PARA
FROM HK22_ASESORIA A
JOIN HK22_USUARIO U
ON A.ID_EMISOR= U.ID
JOIN HK22_USUARIO U2
ON A.ID_RECEPTOR= U2.ID
WHERE UPPER(U.EMAIL)=:APP_USER

Source.SQL Query:
SELECT A.FECHA, A.NOMBRE, A.DESCRIPCION, A.ID_AREA, U2.NOMBRE AS PARA
FROM HK22_ASESORIA A
JOIN HK22_USUARIO U
ON A.ID_EMISOR= U.ID
JOIN HK22_USUARIO U2
ON A.ID_RECEPTOR= U2.ID
WHERE UPPER(U.EMAIL)=:APP_USER 
    AND A.FECHA >= SYSDATE

WHERE UPPER(U.EMAIL)=:APP_USER
